name: Fish For Cat
description:
Do you want to relax while fishing side by side with cute cats in your free time?

Catch as many fish as you can! You just have to tap lightly to select the area where the fish are located and you have the opportunity to catch them all!

How to play?
Cast a fishing line, choose the place with the most fish, and use the fastest time to pull out of the water!

GAME FEATURES:
-Collect varieties of rare fish.
-Simple to play yet offers a nice challenge
-Hours of relaxing fishing fun
-free to play

What could be more fun than fishing with a bunch of cute cats?
Pick up your gear and catch these cunning fish!
